steps.name: Given Skills User is on Endpoint: url/Skills with valid username and password
When skills User sends DELETE skill id ON DELETE Method from "Skills_DELETE" and 1
Then skills User validates the StatusCode and the StatusMessage from "Skills_DELETE" sheet and 1 row
And skills User checks the Database to validate deletion from "Skills_DELETE" sheet and 1 row
